comment:
Nose: sweet and fruity with vanilla notes
Palate: earthy and caramel taste with orange peel on the back. 
Finish: medium burn with alcohol finish. You can taste the wheat and grain as the flavor continues to linger for a nice finish.
Bern’s Select. Caramel and Vanilla. Robust flavor with very high proof. Enjoyed sipping neat. Buy again for sure.
I am not a fan of regular Woodinville.   This is phenomenal.  Very tasty.  Too bad it’s so hard to get
